scripts.update-types: eval $(grep '^SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID' .env) && supabase gen types --lang=typescript --project-id "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID" --schema public > src/types.ts
scripts.sync:data: supabase db dump --data-only -f supabase/seed.sql -s public && supabase db reset
scripts.sync:backup:local: supabase db dump --local --data-only -f supabase/seed_local.sql -s public && supabase db dump --local --data-only -f supabase/seed_auth.sql -s auth
scripts.sync:schema: supabase db diff -f local_schema && supabase db push
